title: The Holy Spirit: Sharing the Divine Life
itunes:title: The Holy Spirit: Sharing the Divine Life
description: As Pentecost approaches, the Church invites us to meditate upon the Holy Spirit, the person who is the love between the Father and the Son. To be in the spirit is to be gifted with what Paul called "charismata," powers enabling us to build up the church of God.
